it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.server

Class LoginThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.server.LoginThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LoginThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class used to handle the first part of the connection with a client. This class represents a thread that it wait a user name before adding a client to the waiting match
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

      • correctMessage

        private boolean correctMessage(LoginMessage message)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Method used to verify the correctness of the client message
        Parameters:
        message - The login message send by the view
        Returns:
        True if the message the chosen user name isn't used yet, false in other cases
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a connection problem
